revised_title: Magnetic Stress and Deformation in Nickel: Experimental Results and Theoretical Analysis
tldr: This study investigates the relationship between magnetic stress and magnetic deformation in nickel. The authors conduct experiments to determine if the change of length in a nickel wire when placed in a magnetic field can be explained by the stresses resulting from magnetization. They compare their experimental results with the theoretical predictions and find that the theory only accounts for a part of the observed contraction, suggesting further research is needed to fully understand the phenomenon.
